DOC.brief_summary: The study focuses to prove the equivalent moisturizing effect of two different Dexpanthenol formulations
DOC.brief_title: Moisturizing Effect of Two Dexpanthenol Formulations
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects Phototype: I to IV according to Fitzpatrick scale Subjects with dry skin on their forearms Pregnant or nursing women Subjects registered as being in exclusion period in the French Health Minister file of subjects Subjects with hypersensitivity to one of the test products
